attributes.action: Make breathalyser ignition systems compulsory in cars
attributes.additional_details: Make drink driving a thing of the past by making it compulsory for all new cars to be fitted with a breathalyser ignition systems. To start your car you would have to first blow into a tube and if you are over the limit the device would then immobilise your car and it would not start until you are under the limit. This would make drink driving harder and this countries road a lot safer.
